subtitle: A little
title: About me
content-1: I am a Frontend Programmer, I have been specializing in this area for a long time, both in college and as a self-taught person. I consider myself an enthusiast for the world of computing, and especially for Web Development.
content-2: In my day to day I work to be able to create websites with modern and intuitive designs, which I enjoy at the moment of making them, putting all of myself and always learning new things. In my free time I like to read, watch movies or series and hang out with friends/family.
